text: Nimen dang qiu nimen de zhu kuanshu [zhu], ranhou, nimen dang xiang ta huizui. Ta jiang shi nimen xiangshou meihao de shenghuo, zhidao guiding de qixian. Ta jiang ba ta de enhui ciyu mei yi wei ying shou enhui zhe. Dan jiaru nimen beini, name, wo dique pa nimen zaoshou zhongda zhi ri [fuhuo ri] de xingfa.
